hotels.title: Luxurious Egypt Beachfront Retreat With Three Restaurants and Direct Beach Access
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of Egyptian luxury at this retreat, located on the pristine sands of the North Coast. This resort is a jewel of the Mediterranean, offering breathtaking views of the turquoise sea from its elegant rooms and suites. Savour a culinary journey across three exquisite restaurants, serving everything from traditional Egyptian cuisine to international favourites. Indulge in a world of relaxation at the opulent spa, offering a range of rejuvenating treatments. For those seeking adventure, the resort is just a short drive from the historic city of El Alamein, home to fascinating World War II museums and memorials. Alternatively, take a leisurely stroll along the stunning beachfront promenade, dotted with restaurants.
